name: OR_CASE_RAD_NEED
description: This table contains documentation regarding radiology special needs.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RADIOLOGY_NEEDS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document special radiology requirements for this case.
